Articles.Content:
I have some wierd issue with my GUI and camera... and I think it is about the "through the eyes of kerbal" (tteok" mod - but not sure.
 

I installed the tteok mod together with raster prop monitor and probe control room and wanted a genuine forced IVA experience. But I have changed my mind - it got to real and to hard so I wanted to switch back. The original setup was that the GUI was removed while in IVA and I was only able to see from a Kerbal perspective while EVA - hence I was not able to see the rocket exept vessel viewer in RPM or while EVA in orbit.

This also made it hard to science - needed to use RPM on each instrument... and I was unable to gather surface samples while on EVA due to not being able to "click my self" for the options.

So I decided to "go back" but I am still forced to IVA while I have Kerbals onboard and the GUI is not showing. I need to click F3 to get up the GUI which pauses the game.

- I am seeing 3rd perspective when EVA though and I am seeing from 3rd perspective when I have unkerbed rockets and probes.

 

Anyone know where I might "turn on" the GUI??

32 minutes ago, EasyAce said:

seeing 3rd perspective when EVA though and I am seeing from 3rd perspective when I have unkerbed rockets and probes.

 

Anyone know where I might "turn on" the GUI??

This sounds more like the IVA Only mod

3 hours ago, linuxgurugamer said:

This sounds more like the IVA Only mod

Ah perfect.

I had not any "IVA Only" mod - but I did have "Quick IVA".

So deleted it and it noe works fine.

 

Thanks!

4 hours ago, EasyAce said:

Ah perfect.

I had not any "IVA Only" mod - but I did have "Quick IVA".

So deleted it and it noe works fine.

 

Thanks!

Same thing, i was on mobile at the time
